inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed adenocarcinoma of the rectum < 15 cm from the anal verge
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Either mobile cancers (with clinical stage T3 or T4 by endorectal ultrasound) or fixed cancer (defined as clinical T4 for this study) on palpation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Malignant disease may not extend to the anal canal (across the dentate line)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: No prior chemotherapy or radiation therapy to the pelvis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with clinical stage T 1-2, N0 rectal cancer who are candidates for primary resection are not eligible
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has lower urinary tract symptoms and is otherwise healthy. Recent blood chemistry was normal.
